name: I Make Snake
description:
Alchemy Game where you mix random objects to make other random objects in order reach your goal. It's a math puzzle game where each starting object has a number and you must perform operations on them to reach the target number. (Like countdown if you've ever seen that). 

NOTE: Items will be spit out of the cauldron if the result of the operation is: a decimal, less than 1, or greater than 500.
